## Rails 7.0.0.alpha2 (September 15, 2021) ##

*   No changes.


## Rails 7.0.0.alpha1 (September 15, 2021) ##

*   Configures a default of 5 for both `open_timeout` and `read_timeout` for SMTP Settings.
